body_content.explanation: a person whose job is to care for and control people who are in prison, and to make sure prison rules are followed:
examples: Five inmates were working at the site under the supervision of two prison wardens.
An alarm alerts prison wardens when drugs, weapons, and mobile phones are discovered.

body_content.explanation: a person in charge of a prison:
examples: Questions about prison security led to the resignation of the prison warden.
The prison warden will decide whether he can go to his mother's funeral.
